Commands.Name: Apply Filter To Array
Commands.Description: Create Filter formula based on top row spill range formula.

Commands.Name: Auto Fill Down
Commands.Description: Fill formula or value in active cell down using smart automation.

Commands.Name: Auto Fill To Right
Commands.Description: Fill formula or value in active cell to right using smart automation.

Commands.Name: Auto-Fit Formula Bar
Commands.Description: Autofit formula bar height based on formula length so that whole formula is visible.

Commands.Name: Compact Formula Format
Commands.Description: Compact formula format of selected cells containing formulas.

Commands.Name: Convert Formula To Structural Ref
Commands.Description: Replace ActiveCell formula precedency range reference with their structured form like A1:D3 is named range and ActiveCell formula use A1:D3 then it will replace A1:D3 with it's named range name.
Commands.Note: Structured reference means using Table, Named Range or # for spill formula. Instead of using A1:D3 this will try to find possible structured reference for that range and use that.

Commands.Name: Copy Formula To English
Commands.Description: Translate ActiveCell formula to en-us locale and copy to clipboard.

Commands.Name: Format Formulas
Commands.Description: Format formulas from selected cells. It will only change cell formula which has a formula.

Commands.Name: Generate Table Lookup Lambdas
Commands.Description: Generate lambdas for each column of an Excel Table.

Commands.Name: Map To Array
Commands.Description: Convert spill parent cell formula to use Map for all the cell of the spill range.

Commands.Name: Paste As References
Commands.Description: Paste clipboard range address to active cell.

Commands.Name: Paste As Structured References
Commands.Description: Paste clipboard range as dynamic address to active cell.

Commands.Name: Paste Auto Fill Down
Commands.Description: Fill formula or value from clipboard range down using smart automation.

Commands.Name: Paste Auto Fill To Right
Commands.Description: Fill formula or value from clipboard range to right using smart automation.

Commands.Name: Paste Exact Formula
Commands.Description: Paste formula exactly as copied and number formats.

Commands.Name: Paste Translate Formula
Commands.Description: Given text in clipboard containing an Excel formula in en-us format, translates it to local languange, and puts it in active cell.

Commands.Name: Remove Outer Function
Commands.Description: Remove the outer function from ActiveCell formula e.g. ActiveCell formula =DROP(SEQUENCE(10,2),2,1) and after running the command it will be =SEQUENCE(10,2)

Commands.Name: Remove Outer Function X 2
Commands.Description: Run Remove Outer Function command twice.

Commands.Name: Remove Outer Function X 3
Commands.Description: Run Remove Outer Function command three times.

Commands.Name: Search Workbook For Specified Functions
Commands.Description: Searches cells, names, and conditional formatting for use of user specified functions and reports findings.

Commands.Name: Search Workbook For Volatile Functions
Commands.Description: Searches cells, names, and conditional formatting for use of volatile functions and reports findings.
Commands.MacroExpression: modFunctionSearch.SearchFunctions("NOW, TODAY, RAND, RANDBETWEEN, RANDARRAY, OFFSET, INDIRECT, CELL, INFO",[[NewTableTargetToRight]])

Commands.Name: Select Spill Parent
Commands.Description: Select dynamic array formula cell. If no spill in ActiveCell then do nothing.

Commands.Name: Toggle Expand Formula Bar
Commands.Description: If formula bar height is 1 then autofit it otherwise make it 1.
